content:
Mainnet-shadow-fork-7 configs are out: https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/tree/main/mainnet-shadow-fork-7

TTD is planned to be reached on Wednesday (22nd June) at ~2PM UTC.  We have an equal client split for all validators. The aim is to test the fixes deployed on ropsten and make sure there are no regressions. 

I'll be running a round of updates + TTD override on Tuesday (21st), if there's anything please do reach out.
